projects.project_name: Techdegree Project 1 - A Random Quote Generator
projects.description: A random quote generator that displays a new quote every 10 seconds or whenever the button is clicked. Every time a new quote gets displayed the background color changes.

projects.project_name: Techdegree Project 2 - List Pagination And Filtering
projects.description: This project adds a pagination filter to the webpage. Not more than 10 list items at a time are displayed. The appropriate navigation bar is generated dynamically. A search feature allows the user to search for a particular student.

This is a form validation project. Fields that fail validation turn red and an error message appears. There is live feedback for the name and e-mail field once they lose focus and for the credit card information and the e-mail field as the user types. Selection options are filtered based on previous selection.
A browser-based word guessing game using JS and OOP. The user can use an on-screen or physical keyboard to guess the letters of a randomly selected phrase.

A page that utilizes the fetch API to request user data. The user data can be filtered with the help of a search field. Once a card is clicked a modal opens up. The user can toggle throught the modals. A search feature works with upper case as well as lower case letters
